data.what_is: RetainIQ is an intelligent email marketing platform that can seamlessly integrate and automate some of the most tedious tasks of creating and managing your email flows. It has a collection of pre-designed email templates that can be personalised and can be made specific to each industry as per the brands' needs. It is an assistant that will run and monitor retention campaigns in autopilot mode and provide you with incredible insights, boosting revenues by up to 30%.

plan_features: All platform features- Seamless integration with Klaviyo and Shopify
Ideal for stores doing upto $25k in monthly sales
All platform features- Seamless integration with Klaviyo and Shopify
Ideal for stores doing upto $100k in monthly sales
All platform features- Seamless integration with Klaviyo and Shopify
Ideal for stores doing upto $350k in monthly sales
All platform features- Seamless integration with Klaviyo and Shopify
Ideal for stores doing above $350k in monthly sales

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RetainIQ?
It has a friendly user interface.
Good targeting messages.
Has strong automation features.

What do you dislike about RetainIQ?
Limited desing flexibility.
Low design templates.
Customization limitations.

What problems is RetainIQ solving and how is that benefiting you?
Retain IQ could benefit from offering a wider variety of email design templates, also there could be mor workflows to automatice different types of email.
